item.title: GitHub new security config
item.description: Right now the GitHub updated it’s authentication protocal from password based to tocken based. It increased the security of the repository but not as convinient as before. I took some note to adopt the new change for github. First request a token from github. Instead of put the password when push the code we should use the token as the password of the github account. In oder to make the pull and push faster we can config the local environment to remember the user name and email by
